data.expected_result: You should able to see the dot circle, long user name should shown as name and tags and ".... " in the end if it gets too long.
data.short_description: when adding friends to group dm, long user name cause visual bug (dot circle) to be cut off by screen, happening to certain user name as well.
data.steps_to_repro: - have a friend with long user name (feel free to ask me, I have two long names). - go to the group dm page and try add your friend into the group dm. - observe how the circle is missing/cut off. - Note: confirmed by eMagic that it is a bug, and also it might appear differently on different ios devices.
